TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 新多穗薹草 ( 原变种) xin duo sui tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Spikes numerous, 5–9 borne in an involucral bract sheath, sometimes ramose and disposed in a panicle. Utricles with ± long beak, nearly horizontally patent at maturity. Fl. and fr. Apr–May.
treatment.distribution: ● Among rocks; ca. 2700 m. C Yunnan (Kunming).
